Posts.Content: I've tried times without number Kate, I've got no where with any of them.  Just anti emetics which I don't want to take.
Posts.Title: Sick for almost a year

Posts.Content: I'm now at my wits end, since the 9th day of radiotherapy in September of last year I have felt sick to varying degrees with sometimes short breaks in between, obviously spoken to docs etc with no success and no solution with the exception that the breast surgeon said my gullet may have been damaged during radiotherapy.  Has anyone else been through this or does anyone have any advice because I've just about had enough now.
Posts.Title: Sick for almost a year

Posts.Content: Has anyone else stopped taking tamoxifen early.  I stopped taking it about a month ago now and am suffering from dreadful bouts of depression, I'm not sure if it's the tamoxifen or not?
Posts.Title: Stopped taking tamoxifen early....
has anyone had any possive experiences with Tamoxifen????? Am due...
